MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G46 postcode area of Giffnock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.46am. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate 3rd party damage to an underground cable and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. Once they arrive, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.13am on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
